Title: Chairman Mao quotation: Raise vigilance to defend the nation
Publisher: PLA Taiyuan City Public Security Organs Military Control Commission Fire Brigade (中国人民解放军太原市公安机关军管会消防大队)
Notes: The text below reads "Strengthen the united defense of soldiers and people, take strict precautions against arson by the class enemy" (加强军民联防，严防阶级敌人纵火破坏).
